vibesExplanation:
The workout primarily falls under 'The Reboot Workout' vibe, indicated by the focus on relieving lower back pain through gentle, restorative yoga. The description mentions 'healing and preventive care' and suggests following up with 'gentle' poses, indicative of deep stretching and low-stress movements typical of this vibe. A high score of 0.9 is assigned due to strong alignment with the vibe's characteristics.

'Zen Flow' is another suitable vibe, with a score of 0.75. The title and content hint at grounding, intentional practice through yoga, emphasizing listening to your body and at-your-own-pace approach, typical of unhurried and breath-centered practices.

'Comfort Moves' is also relevant due to the safe and gentle nature of the exercises aimed at alleviating back pain. The repeated mention of 'gentle' yoga practice aligns with the safe and cozy elements of this vibe, justifying a 0.7 score.

Other active or high-intensity vibes such as 'The Warrior Workout' or 'The Firestarter' are excluded due to the emphasis on healing, gentle movement, and restorative care rather than intensity or high energy.
